description:
Gabimaru the Hollow is one of the most vicious assassins ever to come out of the ninja village of Iwagakure. He’s ruthlessly efficient, but a betrayal results in him being handed a death sentence. He has only one hope—in order to earn his freedom, he must travel to a long-hidden island and recover an elixir that will make the shogun immortal. Failure is not an option. On this island, heaven and hell are just a hair’s breadth away.

(Source: Viz Media)
synonyms: สุขาวดีอเวจี

tags.name: Survival
tags.description: Centers around the struggle to live in spite of extreme obstacles.

tags.name: Samurai
tags.description: Prominently features warriors of medieval Japanese nobility bound by a code of honor.

tags.name: Philosophy
tags.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

tags.name: Ninja
tags.description: Prominently features Japanese warriors traditionally trained in espionage, sabotage and assasination.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Mythology
tags.description: Prominently features mythological elements, especially those from religious or cultural tradition.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Eco-Horror
tags.description: Utilizes a horrifying depiction of ecology to explore man and its relationship with nature.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Battle Royale
tags.description: Centers around a fierce group competition, often violent and with only one winner.

tags.name: Body Horror
tags.description: Features characters who undergo horrific transformations or disfigurement, often to their own detriment.

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Arranged Marriage
tags.description: Features two characters made to marry each other, usually by their family.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Crime
tags.description: Centers around unlawful activities punishable by the state or other authority.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

node.description:
Yuuji Kaku was previously an assistant to [Tatsuki Fujimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/119917/Tatsuki-Fujimoto). He once worked as an editor at Akita Shoten. His cousin is the actor and singer [Takeshi Tsuruno](https://anilist.co/staff/111537/Takeshi-Tsuruno).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ug_kaku)

[Website](https://calebdcook.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/CDCubed)

A translator for VIZ Media, Yen Press, Udon Entertainment, Square Enix, etc.

He is a French translator, living in Japan since 10 years. He translated many well-known manga of the authors Inio Asano and Naoki Urasawa, and received the Konishi prize in 2019 for his translation of Dead Demon Dededede Destruction.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/TatuYukinobu)

Tatsu is a former assistant of the mangaka [Tatsuki Fujimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/119917/Tatsuki-Fujimoto) and [Yuuji Kaku](https://anilist.co/staff/119118/Yuuji-Kaku).

He was previously an assistant to [Tatsuki Fujimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/119917/Tatsuki-Fujimoto) and [Kazue Katou](https://anilist.co/staff/103052/Kazue-Katou)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/_tatsuyaendo_)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/SHIHEILIN)

A freelance editor previously affiliated with Shounen Jump+.
